name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程內容包括流體力學及其應用。
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.Fluid Statics
3.AgiFluid flow phenomena
4.Basic equations of fluid flow
5.Incompressible flow in pipes
scorePolicy:
作業: 10 %
期中考: 30 %
期末考: 45 %
平時成績與課程練習: 15 %
(暫定)
materials: Textbook: McCabe,"Unit Operation of Chemical Engineering" 7th ed.
